name: py-sphinx-theme-builder

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A tool for authoring Sphinx themes with a simple (opinionated) workflow.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-rich
dependencies.description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the
terminal.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependent_to.name: py-furo
dependent_to.description: A clean customisable Sphinx documentation theme..

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-book-theme
dependent_to.description:
Lightweight Sphinx theme designed to mimic the look-and-feel of an
interactive book.

dependent_to.name: py-pydata-sphinx-theme
dependent_to.description:
A clean, three-column, Bootstrap-based Sphinx theme by and for the
PyData community.
